Service & Value 3Pk 6Ft iPhone Cables：Our 6ft lightning cable is enough long to use whether in office, car or at home, you can enjoy safety fast charging anytime & anywhere. All iPhone iPad lightning cable provide 12 months professional customer service support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Quality Lightning Cable: The iPhone cables have great resistance to heat and corrosion. Even after using the cable for a long amount of time, the cables keep their original appearance. They look brand new and fashionable even after being used! The Perfect Lengths for all Occasions: The lightning cable is ideal for many different occasions. For Example, you can keep using your devices while charging in your bedroom, kitchen, and even in the backseat of your car! This cable will provide you with a comfortable and convenient experience with no more of those annoying messages saying your device is not charging. No more constant reminders on the phone screen telling you the frustrating truth, that the cable you are using cannot charge your favorite device.

Fit Most Phone Cases The iPhone fast charger cable can fit most iPhone cases and accessories, and never fracture, effectively prolong the service life. 20X More Durable iPhone Cord Anti-tangling and durable iPhone lightning cord is made of special materials. Every lightning cable have passed 20000+ bending test and 20000+ plugging and unplugging test, aiming to provide the best lightning cable for our customer. Faster Charging & Sync 20% Faster than other iPhone charging cords - After long-term testing for IOS lightning cable, we selected four-core higher quality copper wires to make, which makes charging faster and more stable. You can enjoy fast charging [2.4A] and high-speed data transferring [480Mbps].

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These work good .. but just like all chargers they all quit working after some point .. they seems to all quit working at the same times too.. so i but more every 6months to keep ‘em fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They work and the price is good
reviews.reviewText: I bought the three pack, because my kids always steal my cords. I gave them each a cord and told them to leave mine alone lol. They all work fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Never-Ending iPhone Charger Disappearing Act
reviews.reviewText: Oh boy, folks, let me tell you about the magical disappearing act of my iPhone chargers! I bought this 3-pack because, you see, I have two teenage boys, and it's like living in a real-life version of the Bermuda Triangle for chargers.These Apple MFi Certified Lightning Cables are like the Houdini of the cable world. They're the real deal – six feet of pure, unadulterated charging glory. I tried everything to keep them from vanishing into thin air. I hid them, locked them in a vault, and even labeled them with "MOM'S CHARGER - HANDS OFF!" But, alas, my teenage sorcerers still managed to make them disappear.It's like a game of hide and seek that never ends. But hey, at least I know these chargers are up for the challenge. They're tough, durable, and they keep on working their magic, even when they reappear from the abyss of teenage backpacks and mysterious hiding spots.So, if you too have teenage magicians in your house, this 3-pack is your secret weapon. It's like the Energizer Bunny of iPhone chargers – it keeps going and going, no matter how many times it disappears and reappears. Pure charging wizardry, I tell you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very much worth the 7 dollars
reviews.reviewText: These chargers are awsome so inexpensive and have lasted longer than any of the over priced chargers I’ve been buying from stores near my house. I was going through so much money on chargers that only worked for a few days. I will always buy these chargers from Amazon from now on. They last forever as long as you don’t loose them or break them by accident, they work great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor shipping time and not durable for long term
reviews.reviewText: Other companies ship it the next day. This one takes a week. Not smart if the customer needs it quicklyAlso the neck part wears out and becomes disconnected over time. It’s happened three or four different times with this brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: All 3 were not working within 21 days of purchase . If could give 0 star I would have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The charger sits loosely in the socket and frequently stops charging at random times, it’s made me late for work multiple times when it stops overnight and my phone dies which meant no alarm, absolute waste of money avoid at all costs
